评论概述: Shrank at least a 1 1/2 size on the first wash
评论详情: Loved the loose flowy fit of this dress right out of the bag, in yellow, loved the lack of elastic, ordered another one from the same listing, in red, based on the comfy fit and have not yet washed the red one. I wore the yellow a couple times before washing.  I washed it in luke warm water, gentle cycle, tumbled with no heat and then hung it to dry in my 69 degree bathroom.  I could not have treated this garment with more care!  It shrunk SIGNIFIGANTLY!  The top is now fully form fitting where it hung off of me in a perfectly relaxed and flowy fit before.  NOT HAPPY!  Excessive shrinkage is a mark of poor quality and should be disclosed to the buyer, size up.  So now I am afraid to wash the red one.  Also, FYI, the yellow has a draw string, no elastic and no pockets. The red has elastic, no draw string, and it does have pockets.  So even though it's lumped into one listing, look very carefully as the different dresses have different features.
Its very flattering. fits perfectly. I have received tons of compliments on this dress.

I'm 5'5" and about 150# and the medium fit perfectly. The style is flattering. 25 of those 150# were added during Covid and mostly in my gut. As someone who has been pretty slender up until now, it's tough for me to judge what styles will minimize versus maximize those extra pounds. This dress is a winner.  I paired with a 3/4-sleeve sweater for the office. I don't think I realized it had pockets when I ordered it, so it was a fabulous surprise. Pockets are especially helpful when wearing to the office as I have to carry both my entry badge and my phone. The pockets are good sized, but disappear into the draping of the dress. (Some pockets can be very obvious and look awful.) As someone else mentioned, the flowers at the base of the navy blue dress are more orange than they appear in the photos. The smaller ones in the dress could pass for salmon or coral, but the trim is very bright and clearly more orange with bright turquoise. It's really very pretty.

I am short and I was looking for a comfortable, long dress for summer.  This one is cute and actually looks like the picture.  The only thing I don't love is it falls a little longer in the back, but that was expected from what the picture shows.

I bought the black with red flowers in a size large- though I normally wear a medium.  My dress "just fits" and is a bit tight on top. The material has no stretch. Disappointed that I spent that much- and I will have to wear it partially unbuttoned with a tank under it in order to have range of motion.

I really liked this dress. I bought the black and the print is beautiful - deep colors - and the fabric is lightweight without being too sheer. The medium was the correct size for me at 5'4", 140lb, but I have a long torso and the waist hit me two inches too high, making me look thicker than I am. So I'm returning it. But if you are short-waisted, go for it!
